Text: Enron Middle East Cc Dear Sir My understanding is that Mr Rick Bergsieker and you are the only directors of Enron Middle East Ltd and that Mr Darrin Donegan is the current local manager of this company I also understand that Mr Bergsieker is not with Enron any more Enron Middle East is still solvent and it has very limited indebtedness other than my outstanding expense claims PLEASE READ ON I was an employee of Enron from September to December and from February to the end my Enron employer was Enron Middle East During this time I incurred business related expenses with the prior knowledge and approval of my supervisors totaling US I have duly filed and had approved these expense claims but unfortunately have not received the reimbursement yet Mr Clay Harris was my last boss and he is still with Enron EGM LNG team London Ms Kim Hickok is the current EGM HR person and has the full documentation relating to the claim PLEASE READ ON Albeit very limited Enron Middle East does have some assets I plead with you to instruct Mr Donegan to sell Enron Middle Easts assets reimburse my preagreed appropriately lodged and duly approved expense claims whose nonpayment has been ruinous for my family I thank you for your help at these difficult times Sertac Yener Previously of EGM LNG team Enron Middle East Dubai United Arab Emirates My current contact details email fax
